title: Biden’s NATO Amity Sparks Debate Among European Allies
sub_head: President-elect’s reassurance of the U.S.’s commitment to NATO has prompted disagreements among Europe’s leaders
body:
BRUSSELS—President-elect Joe Biden told NATO’s secretary-general in a recent telephone call of the U.S.’s “enduring commitment” to the military alliance—a relief for European allies after President Trump’s browbeatings and threats to leave.
But the impending transition to more soothing tones from Washington has also sparked fresh, public squabbles in Europe over how far and fast it should pursue a more independent path on security.
Mr....
